ygData.subject: Shovel of Ponz Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I found out about the Shovel of Ponz quest for Mage s today, Does anyone know anything about it? I have the basic information on it but has anyone
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,
I found out about the Shovel of Ponz quest for Mage's today,
Does anyone know anything about it? I have the basic information on it
but has anyone actually done it?
What it is, is a quest to retrieve a shovel that is a focus item
for a Mage's Earth elemental pet. Apparently it raises the pets agility
and AC. One question I have is if your pet dies do you loose the shovel
too and have to start over? Or does it stay with you each time?
If anyone has info or has done this quest I would love to hear
about it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Steven R. Hulse Denver, CO. USA
steve@... www.kosingigglephits.com
